bilingual.source: Basically, you just need to follow the instructions.
bilingual.target: 基本上，你只需要按照说明操作。

bilingual.source: He is basically a good person, despite his flaws.
bilingual.target: 尽管他有缺点，他基本上是一个好人。

bilingual.source: Basically, we need to finish the project by Friday.
bilingual.target: 基本上，我们需要在周五之前完成这个项目。

bilingual.source: The recipe is basically simple, but it requires some patience.
bilingual.target: 这个食谱基本上很简单，但需要一些耐心。

bilingual.source: The movie is basically about a young girl's journey to find herself.
bilingual.target: 这部电影基本上是关于一个年轻女孩寻找自我的旅程。

bilingual.source: And my boyfriend's English is so good that we just basically speak English all the time.
bilingual.target: 而且我男朋友的英语很好，我们基本上就是一直说英语。

bilingual.source: Basically, an electric car can go twice as far as a gas car for the same price.
bilingual.target: 基本上，同样的价格，一辆电动车的续航能力是一辆汽油车的两倍。

bilingual.source: A mind map is basically a tool that connects information around a central subject.
bilingual.target: 思维导图基本上是一种工具，围绕一个中心主题将信息连接起来。

bilingual.source: I had to go to the hospital to get an X-ray because I basically thought I broke my wrist.
bilingual.target: 我不得不去医院拍 X 光片，因为我基本上以为我的手腕骨折了。

yingyinNormal.en: So basically, this is a getting-rid-of-everything-Rachel-ever-used sale.
yingyinNormal.zh: 基本上这是“瑞秋碰过家具”大拍卖。

yingyinNormal.en: What's this one? "Bulk apperception"? Basically overall intelligence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个是什么？"整体统觉"？基本上就是总体智慧。

yingyinNormal.en: Basically, Rachel and I were in Vegas and we got drunk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 基本上，瑞秋和我在拉斯维加斯，我们喝醉了…

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, OK, OK, OK, well, basically, lately, I've, sort of had feelings for you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 基本上，最近我我对你有一些感觉。

yingyinNormal.en: Basically, there's the thing, and then there's the stuff after the thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 基本上有这件事啦，然后又是那件事…

yingyinNormal.en: And now that gays are legal or whatever, it's basically everyone.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在同性恋合法了，基本上所有人都牵着手。

yingyinNormal.en: Basically your body will go to sleep while your mind travels back in time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 基本上，你的身体会沉睡，期间你的意识穿越到过去。

yingyinNormal.en: You haven't been down here before, have you? Silence Of The Lambs, basically.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你从来没下来过吧？基本上就像《沉默的羔羊》那样。

yingyinNormal.en: Chinese menu guy. Forgot the menus. So, basically just a Chinese guy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 中餐馆的伙计，他忘了拿菜单了，所以基本上只是个中国人而已。

yingyinNormal.en: Basically, what I planned to do was to put a pond in over here, and have water streaming in from both sides.
yingyinNormal.zh: 基本上来说，我想在这造个水池，里面的水从两边流进来。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean I loved you in a you're-my-brother-so-l-have-to kind of way, but basically, yeah, I hated your guts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是说，我就像“你是我哥，所以我必须爱你”那样爱你，但基本上我恨死你了。

yingyinNormal.en: Anything new is bad, curiosity is bad. Going out at night is bad. Basically, anything fun is bad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 任何新鲜事物都是坏的，好奇心是坏的，夜晚外出是坏的。 基本上，任何有意思的都是坏的。

yingyinNormal.en: He's 12, basically you get him to and from school, and make sure he eats. That's it. Anything else you need, Esa will help you. Esa? Yes, ma'ma.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他12岁，基本上你只需要接送他上学放学，就这些，如果你需要什么，埃萨会帮你，埃萨？是的，夫人。

yingyinNormal.en: I basically just run past the guard gates, so I think I have 20 minutes until they find me. You don't have a break coming up, do you? I'm off in ten minutes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我基本上是从安检门冲进来的。我觉得还要二十分钟，他们才能发现我。一会儿你就休息了，是吧。 我十分钟后下班。

yingyinNormal.en: She was incredible. And I would put on all these plays in my bedroom and it would basically just she and I reenacting the scenes from the movies. And then I wrote my own plays. Wow. Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她是真的很了不起。我会把所有的剧本放在我的卧室然后基本上就是我和她重现电影里的桥段。然后我写了一部自己剧本。是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, most of being a parent isn't fair. Right now, Alex is obsessed with some CEO business woman author who's basically an older-looking version of me. We're the same age, by the way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为人父母大部分时候都没有公平可言。现在艾丽克斯迷上了一个什么CEO商业女强人作家，她基本上就是个看起来老一点版本的我。顺带一提我和她同龄。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, that's basically what I said.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这不就是我刚说的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Basically, it's this or Auto Universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 反正，不是这里就是《机动世界》

yingyinNormal.en: And basically open the whole domain for me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些为我开创了一个新的领域。

yingyinNormal.en: And it's like basically making a very fiery broth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实像做一道特别辣的肉汤。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in the most important ways, without considering things that are less important

examination_example.sentence: I <highlight>basically</highlight> thought I broke my wrist, although, thankfully, it's not broken.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我以为我的手腕断了，不过谢天谢地，并没有断。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Basically</highlight>, what we need from you is financial support.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大体来说，我们需要你的财政支持。

examination_example.sentence: And my boyfriend's English is so good that we just <highlight>basically</highlight> speak English all the time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且我男朋友的英语很好，我们基本上就是一直说英语。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: A mind map is <highlight>basically</highlight> a tool that connects information around a central subject.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 思维导图基本上是一种工具，围绕一个中心主题将信息连接起来。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Basically</highlight>, an electric car can go twice as far as a gas car for the same price.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基本上，同样的价格，一辆电动车的续航能力是一辆汽油车的两倍。
